name: .FDT File Extension
summary: Learn about .FDT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Template created by Final Draft, an application used for authoring movie, television, and stage play scripts; saves the default document text and formatting for creating a new .FDX Final Draft document; allows multiple scripts to adopt the same structure.

content: NOTE: FDT files are created by Final Draft versions 5-7. Version 8 templates use the .FDXT extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
